From Marcia Hess, WY State Director and former South Dakota State Director: "A wonderful teacher at Cornerstones Career Learning center in South Dakota created this flow chart for GED® preparation classes so she had a visual for her students to help guide them in what was coming and what they need to know before taking the GED®. It cut down on the 'Am I ready to take the test now?' question and help the students to self-monitor. Flow Chart in pdf.
